function statusChangeCallback(response){
        console.log(response);
        if(response !== null && response.status === 'connected'){
          $("#loginDiv").hide();
          $("#loadingDiv").show();
        }else{
          $("#loginDiv").show();
          $("#loadingDiv").hide();
          window.location.replace("./login.html");
        }
      }
